Title: Multi-Line Service Change Request for Business Accounts
LimitChange: What services would you like to change?
RecipientNumber: How many will be receiving this change?
RecipientData: Input recipient data to bulk send an envelope to

SeeMore.Title: Behind the scenes
SeeMore.Text:
This sample features:

  • Remote signing
  • Data entry tabs
  • Anchor positioning
  • Bulk sending

Code flow:

View the controller and envelope code on GitHub.

Step 1
When the button is selected, we ask the user to select how they would like to change their service and how many accounts will be receiving the change. Depending on how many accounts are changing, we ask the user to input a name and email address for the number of accounts specified.

Step 2
Using the BulkSend: createBulkSendList API method, we build a list of contacts that will receive the bulk envelopes.

Step 3
Create the envelope definition. Create a document from a PDF and add it to the envelope. Add a placeholder Signer to the envelope that will later be replaced by the recipients in the bulk list that you created in the previous step. Place tabs in the document using anchor strings.

Step 4
Initiate bulk sending to send the envelope to the recipients with BulkSend: createBulkSendRequest.
